issue.title: Stopwatch.StartStopReset test is flaky on windows

content.raw:
~~~
59: [ RUN      ] Stopwatch.StartStopReset
59: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-math\src\Stopwatch_TEST.cc(53): error: Expected: (_time.ElapsedRunTime()) >= (std::chrono::milliseconds(1000)), actual: 8-byte object <C5-DB 93-3B 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <E8-03 00-00 00-00 00-00>
59: ElapsedRunTime 999667 us vs 1000000 us
59: 
59: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-math\src\Stopwatch_TEST.cc(66): error: Expected: (_time.ElapsedRunTime()) >= (std::chrono::milliseconds(1000)), actual: 8-byte object <A8-6F 99-3B 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <E8-03 00-00 00-00 00-00>
59: ElapsedRunTime 999911 us vs 1000000 us
59: 
59: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-math\src\Stopwatch_TEST.cc(79): error: Expected: (_time.ElapsedStopTime()) >= (std::chrono::milliseconds(1000)), actual: 8-byte object <72-68 96-3B 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <E8-03 00-00 00-00 00-00>
59: ElapsedStopTime 999801 us vs 1000000 us
59:

59: ElapsedRunTime 1999842 us vs 2000000 us
59: 
59: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-math\src\Stopwatch_TEST.cc(53): error: Expected: (_time.ElapsedRunTime()) >= (std::chrono::milliseconds(1000)), actual: 8-byte object <CA-C2 97-3B 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <E8-03 00-00 00-00 00-00>
59: ElapsedRunTime 999895 us vs 1000000 us
59: 
59: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-math\src\Stopwatch_TEST.cc(79): error: Expected: (_time.ElapsedStopTime()) >= (std::chrono::milliseconds(1000)), actual: 8-byte object <36-A8 96-3B 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <E8-03 00-00 00-00 00-00>
